ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and when I am ill, it is He who heals me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And heals me when I am sick,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and Who, when I am ill, heals me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and heals me when I am sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And when I fall ill, so it is He Who heals me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when I am ill, it is He Who cures me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when I am sick, then He restores me to health
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and, whenever I am sick, heals me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when I sicken, then He healeth me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He who cures me when I am ill;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when I sicken, then He healeth me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and when I get sick, it is He who cures me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when I am ill, it is He Who cures me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who, when I am sick, heals me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when I get sick, He heals me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:80] and when I am sick, it is He Who cures me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when I sicken, then He healeth me) He cures me from sickness when I am sick, 412
